title: Probabilistic Modeling
content:
Core Concepts # Prior $P(\theta)$ and likelihood $P(D|\theta)$ form posterior via Bayes Rule. Model uncertainty is critical in embedded ML and safety-critical systems. $$ P(\theta|D) = \frac{P(D|\theta)P(\theta)}{P(D)} $$
Applications # Neural network calibration Monte Carlo simulation Probabilistic inference in robotics

title: codes
content: This folder includes code experiments for Monte Carlo methods, Bayesian inference, and neural network calibration in embedded contexts.

title: Topics
content: This section organizes deep-dive theory and notes on technical areas relevant to research and applied engineering.
